00010 #include "sysMalloc.h"

00012 static void *baseMalloc(size_t nbytes, memArea_t * memArea){
00013         unsigned int aux1;
00014         unsigned int aux2;
00015         
00016         aux1 = (unsigned int)memArea->address;
00017         aux2 = (unsigned int)memArea->size;
00018         
00019         if((aux1 + aux2 - (unsigned int)memArea->allocp) >= nbytes){
00020                 memArea->allocp += nbytes;
00021                 return memArea->allocp - nbytes;
00022         }else{
00023                 return NULL;
00024         }
00025 
00026 }

00035 void *sysRealloc(void *ptr, size_t size, memArea_t * (*getMemoryArea)()){
00036         void *ret;
00037 
00038         if ( ptr == NULL ) {
00039                 return sysMalloc(size, getMemoryArea);
00040         }
00041         if( (ret=sysMalloc(size, getMemoryArea)) != NULL ){
00042             memcpy(ret, ptr, size);
00043 
00044         }
00045         return ret;
00046 }

00048 void *sysMalloc(size_t nbytes, memArea_t * (*getMemoryArea)()){
00049         void * debug;
00050         memArea_t * memArea;
00051         
00052         memArea = getMemoryArea();
00053         
00054         debug  = baseMalloc(nbytes, memArea);
00055 
00056         return debug;
